text: RobbyВ Mook, campaign manager for Hillary for America, released the following statement Friday evening in response toВ Donald Trump's commentsВ referencing possible acts of violence against Hillary Clinton:"Donald Trump, the Republican nominee for President, has a pattern ofВ inciting people to violence. Whether this is done to provokeВ protesters at a rally or casually or even as a joke, it is anВ unacceptable quality in anyone seeking the job of Commander in Chief.В This kind of talk should be out of bounds for a presidentialВ candidate, just like it should be out of bounds for a presidentialВ candidate to peddle a conspiracy theory about the President of theВ United States for five years. But we've seen again and again that noВ amount of failed resets can change who Donald Trump is. He is unfitВ to be President and it is time Republican leaders stand up to denounceВ this disturbing behavior in their nominee."
title: Statement from Robby Mook On Trump's Comments About Possible Violence Against Hillary Clinton
